p: Leaves of ripe pomegranate fruits, fig, guava and olive were collected in September while the fruits of pomegranate where collected in October, 2017 from the Research Farm of Faculty of Agriculture, Cairo University, Giza, Egypt. Samples were handpicked from different trees and verified by Dr. Abdalatif, A. M. Assistant Professor of Horticulture Department, Faculty of Agriculture, Cairo University as shown in Table 1.
